titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2020) making appropriations for the Treasury Department, the United States Postal Service, the Executive Office of the President, and certain Independent Agencies, for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1996, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 104-190, by Mr. Diaz-Balart.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2020 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Points of order against the bill for failure to comply with clause 2 or 6 of rule XXI shall be waived, with specified exceptions. Measure will be read by title. Bill is open to amendments. The Chair may accord priority in recognition to those Members who have had their amendments printed in the Congressional Record.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 74.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 232 - 192 (Roll no. 516).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 7/17/1995--Introduced. Sets forth the open rule for consideration of H.R. 2020 (FY 1996 appropriations for the Department of Treasury, U.S. Postal Service, Executive Office of the President, and certain independent agencies).
